original_text: Some people may say to you, “Look, the Messiah is out there in the wilderness.” But do not go out to see who is there. Some people may say to you, “Look, the Messiah is hiding in that secret room.” You must not believe these people.
korean_text: 그러면 사람들이 너희에게 말하되 보라 그리스도가 광야에 있다 하여도 나가지 말고 보라 골방에 있다 하여도 믿지 말라

sentences.original_text: Some people may say to you
“Look, the Messiah is out there in the wilderness.”
But do not go out to see who is there
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 밖에 나가서 누가 있는지 보지 말라

sentences.original_text: Some people may say to you
“Look, the Messiah is hiding in that secret room.”
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 메시야가 저 밀실에 숨어 계시다

sentences.original_text: You must not believe these people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 사람들을 믿어서는 안 된다
